WorkItem.Description:
Below is the description of what was done to get these methods to work, but it needs to be fixed at some point to "properly" support this functionality:
Â 
The execCommand "fontsize" doesn't work in Safari, and it doesn't support "increaseFontSize" or "decreaseFontSize", so consiquentially the work around to get this working was to wrap the current selection in <span> tags with the css font-size set to "smaller" or "larger" appropriately. This isn't the ideal solution but it works.
WorkItem.Summary: Fix increaseFontSize and decreaseFontSize "properly" in Safari
